article.title: 6 Must Visit Spots Of Lake Kawaguchi Next To Mt. Fuji
article.lead_paragraph: Lake Kawaguchi (Kawaguchiko) is one of the Fuji Five Lakes that can be found around Mount Fuji, the most iconic mountain in Japan. It is also the most accessible lake amongst the Fuji Five Lakes. Here are 6 spots around Lake Kawaguchi that you definitely have to visit!
article.meta_description: Lake Kawaguchi is one of the Fuji Five Lakes that is located around Mount Fuji. Here are 6 spots around Lake Kawaguchi that you definitely have to visit!

snippets.title: 1. Enjoy the various views of Lake Kawaguchi (Kawaguchiko)
snippets.title_with_numbering: 1. Enjoy the various views of Lake Kawaguchi (Kawaguchiko)
snippets.description:
The marvelous lake that offers a fantastic view of beautiful landscape and the iconic Mount Fuji has various locations that will offer you a different atmosphere. One of the recommend locations to enjoy a great view is the Tozawa Campsite, just 10 minutes from Kawaguchiko Station by car. Here, you can appreciate the marvelous scenery of Mount Fuji’s reflection on the lake, also known as “Sakasa Fuji”, or the “Upside-down Mt Fuji”.

> #### Kawaguchiko
>
> **Address**: Fujikawaguchiko, Minamitsuru, Yamanashi Prefcture
>
> **Opening Hours**: 24 Hours
>
> **Access**: 13 minute walk from Kawaguchiko Station of Fujikyu Railway

snippets.title: 2. A bird’s eye view from Mount Kachi Kachi Ropeway
snippets.title_with_numbering: 2. A bird’s eye view from Mount Kachi Kachi Ropeway
snippets.description:
Mount Kachi Kachi Ropeway is conveniently located just 13 minutes from Kawaguchiko Station. You will be able to access the top of the mountain, also known as the Tenjoyama Park, via a 3 minute long ropeway ride. Those who prefer an adventure can walk up the hiking route too. From the top of the mountain, you will be offered an amazing view of the city, Kawaguchiko, Mount Fuji and the other nature that surrounds it. Different sceneries can be enjoyed according to the season.

> #### Mount Kachi Kachi Ropeway
>
> **Address**: ‪1163-1 Azagawa‬, ‪Minamitsuru,‪ Fujikawaguchiko,‪ Yamanashi Prefecture‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬
>
> **Opening Hours**: Depends on season, please refer to official website
>
> **Access**: 13 minute walk from Kawaguchiko Station
>
> **Website**: [Mount Kachi Kachi Ropeway](http://www.kachikachiyama-ropeway.com/en/)

snippets.title: 3. The soothing music boxes of Kawaguchiko Music Forest
snippets.title_with_numbering: 3. The soothing music boxes of Kawaguchiko Music Forest
snippets.description:
The Kawaguchiko Music Forest is a museum about 30 minutes from Kawaguchiko Station by bus. Here, various types of music boxes are placed on display, together with one of the biggest mechanical organs in the world. There are a total of 3 exhibit halls and cathartic music will serenade you as you walk around the museum. Furthermore, if you happen to visit Kawaguchiko Music Forest around June, you will also be able to enjoy a fantastic rose garden outside where over 720 species of roses will be on display!

> #### Kawaguchiko Music Forest
>
> **Address**: 3077-20 Kawaguchi, Minamitsuru, Fujikawaguchiko, Yamanashi Prefecture
>
> **Opening Hours**: 9:00am - 5:30pm
>
>
> **Access**: 26 minute bus ride from Kawaguchiko Station
>
> **Website**: [Kawaguchiko Music Forest](http://kawaguchikomusicforest.jp/)

<iframe src="https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m18!1m12!1m3!1d3247.2616875546637!2d138.7664483149979!3d35.5225303462671!2m3!1f0!2f0!3f0!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1s0x60195e4f455690bf%3A0xcc5aa17825df4a75!2sKawaguchiko+Music+Forest!5e0!3m2!1sen!2sjp!4v1507637318132" width="400" height="300" frameborder="0" style="border:0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

snippets.title: 4. Appreciate the seasons at Oishi Park Kawaguchiko Natural Living Center
snippets.title_with_numbering: 4. Appreciate the seasons at Oishi Park Kawaguchiko Natural Living Center
snippets.description:
Oishi Park Kawaguchiko Natural Living Center is one of the best places around Kawaguchiko to appreciate the seasons – one of the boons of Japan’s geographic location. For those who love photography, one of the best seasons to visit this place is during summer, especially in June and July. During this period, various types of flowers will be blooming, creating a marvelous scenery of colorful flowers, a huge lake, and the beautiful Mount Fuji.

> #### Oishi Park Kawaguchiko Natural Living Center
>
> **Address**: 2585-2 Oishi, Fujikawaguchiko, Minamitsuru, Yamanashi
>
> **Opening Hours**: Please refer to official website
>
> **Access**: 12 minute bus from Kawaguchiko Station
>
> **Website**: [Oishi Park Kawaguchiko Natural Living Center](http://www.fkchannel.jp/naturelivingcenter/)

<iframe src="https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m18!1m12!1m3!1d3247.2473444904317!2d138.7433142149979!3d35.52288484624783!2m3!1f0!2f0!3f0!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1s0x60195fa1382c5f3f%3A0xf9f82bd5edd590df!2sKawaguchiko+Natural+Living+Center!5e0!3m2!1sen!2sjp!4v1507637446299" width="400" height="300" frameborder="0" style="border:0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

snippets.title: 5. The Herb Festival at Yagizaki Park
snippets.title_with_numbering: 5. The Herb Festival at Yagizaki Park
snippets.description:
The lavender is one of the most popular flowers in the Kawaguchiko region. At Yagizaki Park, a Herb Festival is held annually during late June to early July, where the whole park will be saturated with beautiful purple lavender flowers in full bloom. A sweet scent will guide you to the park and apart from the beautiful scenery of lavender flowers with the lake and Mount Fuji, you can also enjoy other snacks such as Lavender Ice Cream! Definitely a must-try!

> #### Yagizaki Park
>
> **Address**: 912-1 Kodachi, Fujikawaguchiko, Minamitsuru, Yamanashi
>
> **Opening Hours**: 24 hours
>
> **Access**: 10 minute bus from Kawaguchiko Station
>
> **Website**: [Yagizaki Park](http://www.fujisan.ne.jp.e.aca.hp.transer.com/view/info.php?no=496)

<iframe src="https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m18!1m12!1m3!1d144787.64896945652!2d138.62138402020557!3d35.555654541345746!2m3!1f0!2f0!3f0!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1s0x60195fc9ddc33769%3A0xdfa6b343b8437474!2z5YWr5pyo5bSO5ZyS!5e0!3m2!1sen!2sjp!4v1507637596469" width="400" height="300" frameborder="0" style="border:0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

snippets.title: 6. Maple Corridor at colored leaves festival
snippets.title_with_numbering: 6. Maple Corridor at colored leaves festival
snippets.description:
A beautiful scenery of maple leafs is the epitome of Japan’s autumn landscape. From November 1 to November 23, the colored leaves festival will be held at the Northern region of Kawaguchiko. One of the highlights of the festival is the “maple leaf tunnel” where over 60 maple trees with bright yellow and orange leaves will be lit up, creating an extremely dreamy scene. This is an event that is highly recommended! More information about the festival can be found on the official website.

> #### Colored leaves festival (Maple Corridor)
>
> **Address**: Kawaguchi, Fujikawaguchiko, Minamitsuru, Yamanashi (refer to the map)
>
>**Hours**: 24 hours. Night light up is from 7pm to 10pm
>
> **Access**: 25 minute bus from Kawaguchiko Station
>
> **Website**: [Colored leaves festival](http://www.fujisan.ne.jp.e.aca.hp.transer.com/search/info.php?ca_id=3&if_id=680)

<iframe src="https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m18!1m12!1m3!1d3247.128407579426!2d138.76014901499792!3d35.525824346087155!2m3!1f0!2f0!3f0!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1s0x60195e52526915f9%3A0x1a967cee111ec37d!2sMaple+Corridor!5e0!3m2!1sen!2sjp!4v1507637742749" width="400" height="300" frameborder="0" style="border:0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

snippets.title: Admire the beauty of Kawaguchiko
snippets.description: Mount Fuji can be viewed from almost any spot around Kawaguchiko, but the different destinations will give a different taste to the amazing spectacle of the mountain. Many of the areas can be accessed conveniently via the route bus from Kawaguchiko Station. Plan your trip early and enjoy Japan!

embed.value: Mount Fuji can be viewed from almost any spot around Kawaguchiko, but the different destinations will give a different taste to the amazing spectacle of the mountain. Many of the areas can be accessed conveniently via the route bus from Kawaguchiko Station. Plan your trip early and enjoy Japan!

lead_paragraph_embed.value: Lake Kawaguchi (Kawaguchiko) is one of the Fuji Five Lakes that can be found around Mount Fuji, the most iconic mountain in Japan. It is also the most accessible lake amongst the Fuji Five Lakes. Here are 6 spots around Lake Kawaguchi that you definitely have to visit!

tags.name: where to visit around mt. fuji?

navigator.introduction: Hi there, thanks for stopping by to read my articles. I travel to various regions in Japan and constantly find myself discovering something new. Hope my work will help in your planning and enjoy your vacation in Japan!
